oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: A curious description of a dance and other doings of sorcerers was given in explanation of No. 3 of Mr Stow’s copies of Bushman paintings (L V.
5775). Further details regarding sorcerers (suggested by Mr J.M. Orpen’s copy of Bushman paintings – published in the for July, 1874) were also given by Díä!kwãin (L V.
